slides.script: I was so stressed, I forgot my computer password 3 times in one day. My mind was scattered and I felt overwhelmed by everything.
slides.image_prompt: Ultra photorealistic image of a stressed woman sitting at a computer desk, head in her hands, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Stress was taking over my life. I'd walk into rooms and forget why I was there. I'd lose my train of thought mid-sentence. Sound familiar?
slides.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of the same woman looking confused in a kitchen, as if she forgot something, ultra detailed, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: What doctors don't tell you is that chronic stress can rewire your brain. While I was struggling, an ancient solution already existed...
slides.image_prompt: Photorealistic render of a doctor talking to a patient with a brain scan in the background, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: My yoga instructor pulled me aside after class. She told me about an herb called Ashwagandha, used for centuries in Ayurvedic medicine to ease stress and sharpen focus.
slides.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a yoga instructor talking to the stressed woman in a peaceful yoga studio, ultra detailed, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I did some digging and found that Ashwagandha is backed by Nobel Prize winning research. It's even been clinically shown to reduce cortisol, the stress hormone, by up to 28%.
slides.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of a Nobel Prize medal next to a medical journal open to a page about Ashwagandha research, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: I started taking Ashwagandha daily. Day 3: I noticed I was sleeping better. Day 7: My mind felt clearer, more focused. By week 2, my husband said I seemed like a new person - calmer, happier.
slides.image_prompt: Photorealistic image showing a 2 week timeline with the woman looking progressively more relaxed and happy, ultra detailed, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Even my skeptical mom noticed the difference. We hadn't spoken in weeks due to a silly argument. When I called to apologize, she said "I don't know what's changed, but you sound so much better.
slides.image_prompt: Photorealistic image of the woman on a video call with her surprised but smiling mother, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Now, I have the clarity to power through my to-do list at work. The patience to be present with my kids. The resilience to handle setbacks. The confidence to put myself out there and chase my dreams.
slides.image_prompt: Photorealistic image collage showing the woman excelling at work, playing with her kids, and pursuing a hobby with a smile, ultra detailed, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: The Ashwagandha supplement that changed everything for me? Goli Ashwagandha Gummies. Organic, plant-based, and clinically proven. Goli puts the power of this ancient herb into a delicious mixed berry gummy.
